SQL.Name: MergeBasicInfo
SQL.Command: merge INTO ncva.casemain_tran AS cm USING ( SELECT CASE.* FROM ( SELECT '0000' AS cmtypeid, '0000' AS cmseqno FROM sysibm.dual ) t left join ncva.casemain_tran CASE ON CASE.cmtypeid = :CMTYPEID AND CASE.cmseqno = :CMSEQNO ) AS tp ON ( cm.cmtypeid = tp.cmtypeid AND cm.cmseqno = tp.cmseqno ) WHEN matched THEN UPDATE SET deptid = :Update_DEPTID , deptname = :Update_DEPTNAME , patfrom = :Update_PTFROM , personid = :Update_PERSONID , patname = :Update_PATNAME , patbirthday = :Update_PATBIRTHDAY , patsex = :Update_PATSEX , patheight = :Update_PATHEIGHT , patweight = :Update_PATWEIGHT , edulevelcode = :Update_EDULEVELCODE , zipcode = :Update_ZIPCODE , address = :Update_ADDRESS , pattel = :Update_PATTEL , patfriendtel = :Update_PATFRIENDTEL , patmobile = :Update_PATMOBILE , ocpcode = :Update_OCPCODE , otherocpname = :Update_OTHEROCPNAME , reachwaycode = :Update_REACHWAYCODE , levoption = :Update_LEVOPTION , deadthdate = :Update_DEADTHDATE , deadreason = :Update_DEADREASON , deadreasonothertext = :Update_DEADREASONOTHERTEXT , referraldnt = :Update_REFERRALDNT , referralhospitalname = :Update_REFERRALHOSPITALNAME , rehabildate = :Update_REHABILDATE , inpid = :Update_INPID , inpnm = :Update_INPNM , csstatus = :Update_CSSTATUS , hnursta = :Update_HNURSTA , hbed = :Update_HBED , sect = :Update_SECT , hdiagtxt = :Update_HDIAGTXT , hdiagicd = :Update_HDIAGICD , hdiagcod = :Update_HDIAGCOD , patfriendname = :Update_PATFRIENDNAME , hdocnamc = :Update_HDOCNAMC , istmpsaved = :Update_ISTMPSAVED WHEN NOT matched THEN INSERT ( cmtypeid, cmseqno, deptid, deptname, patfrom, personid, patname, patsex, patbirthday, patheight, patweight, edulevelcode, zipcode, address, pattel, patfriendtel, patmobile, ocpcode, otherocpname, reachwaycode, levoption, deadthdate, deadreason, deadreasonothertext, referraldnt, referralhospitalname, rehabildate, inpid, inpnm, csstatus, hnursta, hbed, sect, hdiagtxt, hdiagicd, hdiagcod, opendate, opentime, openpid, openpnm, patfriendname, :Insert_OPENPID , :Insert_OPENPNM , :Insert_PATFRIENDNAME , :Insert_HDOCNAMC )

SQL.Name: MergeTimesheetInfo
SQL.Command: merge INTO ncva.timesheet_tran AS tm USING ( SELECT CASE.* FROM ( SELECT '0000' AS cmtypeid, '0000' AS cmseqno FROM sysibm.dual ) t left join ncva.timesheet_tran CASE ON CASE.cmtypeid = :CMTYPEID AND CASE.cmseqno = :CMSEQNO ) AS tp ON ( tm.cmtypeid = tp.cmtypeid AND tm.cmseqno = tp.cmseqno ) WHEN matched THEN UPDATE SET occdate = :Update_OCCDATE , occtime = :Update_OCCTIME , arrdate = :Update_ARRDATE , arrtime = :Update_ARRTIME , drvsdate = :Update_DRVSDATE , drvstime = :Update_DRVSTIME , ctmridate = :Update_CTMRIDATE , ctmritime = :Update_CTMRITIME , hdisdt = :Update_HDISDT , hadmdt = :Update_HADMDT , hadmtm = :Update_HADMTM , isivtpacheck = :Update_ISIVTPACHECK , ivtpaplace = :Update_IVTPAPLACE , ivtpaplacename = :Update_IVTPAPLACENAME , ivtpadate = :Update_IVTPADATE , ivtpatime = :Update_IVTPATIME , ivtpareason = :Update_IVTPAREASON , ivtpasubreason = :Update_IVTPASUBREASON , ivtpadoze = :Update_IVTPADOZE , ivtpaothertext = :Update_IVTPAOTHERTEXT , inpid = :Update_INPID , inpnm = :Update_INPNM , istmpsaved = :Update_ISTMPSAVED WHEN NOT matched THEN INSERT ( cmtypeid, cmseqno, occdate, occtime, arrdate, arrtime, drvsdate, drvstime, ctmridate, ctmritime, hdisdt, hadmdt, hadmtm, isivtpacheck, ivtpaplace, ivtpaplacename, ivtpadate, ivtpatime, ivtpareason, ivtpasubreason , ivtpadoze, ivtpaothertext, inpid, inpnm ) VALUES ( :Insert_CMTYPEID , :Insert_CMSEQNO , :Insert_OCCDATE , :Insert_OCCTIME , :Insert_ARRDATE , :Insert_ARRTIME , :Insert_DRVSDATE , :Insert_DRVSTIME , :Insert_CTMRIDATE , :Insert_CTMRITIME , :Insert_HDISDT , :Insert_HADMDT , :Insert_HADMTM , :Insert_ISIVTPACHECK , :Insert_IVTPAPLACE , :Insert_IVTPAPLACENAME , :Insert_IVTPADATE , :Insert_IVTPATIME , :Insert_IVTPAREASON , :Insert_IVTPASUBREASON , :Insert_IVTPADOZE , :Insert_IVTPAOTHERTEXT , :Insert_INPID , :Insert_INPNM )

SQL.Name: SelectCASSEMAINByCMSEQNO
SQL.Command: Select NCVA.CASEMAIN_TRAN.*,NCVA.DEFCODE_REF.DESCRIPTION as StatusName ,NCVA.HISCASE_TRAN.HHISNUM,NCVA.HISCASE_TRAN.HCASENO,NCVA.HISCASE_TRAN.HCASETYP From NCVA.CASEMAIN_TRAN Inner Join NCVA.HISCASE_TRAN ON NCVA.CASEMAIN_TRAN.CMSEQNO = NCVA.HISCASE_TRAN.CMSEQNO Left Join NCVA.DEFCODE_REF ON NCVA.CASEMAIN_TRAN.CSSTATUS = NCVA.DEFCODE_REF.CODEID AND NCVA.DEFCODE_REF.CODEBOOKID = 'CASESTATUS' Where NCVA.CASEMAIN_TRAN.CMSEQNO = :CMSEQNO
